translations: adj.柔和的；绒毛的；多丘岗的

phrs.translation: 霜霉病；霜霉菌；大豆霜霉病；露菌病

sentences.sentence: Pockets make the best pockets. Vaginas are too upside-downy to make for good pockets.
Seals that are weaned and have shed their downy fur are called beaters for the way they beat their flippers on the water.
sentences.translation: 断奶后褪去一身绒毛的海豹被称为打手，因其总是在水上拍打它们的鳍状肢。
